title: Handle Entry Denial for Prohibited Item
description: A visitor at a stadium entrance has a prohibited item (a large backpack) and is denied entry by security.

tasks.description: Politely inform the visitor that their backpack exceeds the size limit allowed in the stadium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and calmly explains the policy.

tasks.description: Advise the visitor of their options, such as returning the bag to their vehicle or using a nearby paid locker service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful solutions to the visitor.

tasks.description: Reiterate that they can enter once they no longer have the prohibited item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the visitor understands how they can gain entry.
